outputs.output_descr:
The goal of this project is to promote the concept and principles of sustainable human development in the society, including the leading academic institutions, research centres, mass media and policy-makers of Azerbaijan. This will be achieved through introducing and systematically expanding the teaching of human development concept in local universities and national training institutions.

The specific objectives are: 1) to build capacities of educational institutions in contributing to human-centred public policy at different levels; and 2) to create human development labs for students, teachers, state officials, and different professionals engaged in socio-economic policies.

While the project will focus on teaching of human development approaches, it will also aim at integrating HD Course, annual national HD reports, policy briefs and any other substantive reports into a strong Azerbaijani concept of human development.

This project on promoting the human development teaching will evolve through the following components:

Component 1. Human Development Teaching

Component 2. Establishment of human development labs

project_descr: Strengthening the capacity of educational institutions for teaching and applying the human development concept
